value.name: 110 Black Men And Boys Killed By Police
value.description: Jordan Baker was fatally shot on Jan. 16, 2014 by Houston, Texas police officer Juventino Castro, a Hispanic cop who was off duty but in uniform, during what his family said was a racial profiling ...

value.name: America uprising: Scholars reflect on the death of George Floyd. Plus, 10 tips for journalists covering protests against police violence.
value.description: Nearly a dozen scholars on policing, economic and health inequality and media narratives reflect on the death of George Floyd in Minneapolis.

value.name: ‘A ghetto school’: Six students suspended after fight at troubled school
value.description: A student filmed a fight at the troubled Walgett Community College, which led to the suspension of six students. It is the latest incident at a school plagued with violence.

video.name: ‘A ghetto school’: Six students suspended after fight at troubled school

value.name: Don’t call police if students breach ban on knives at school, teachers told
value.description: If a student brings any kind of knife to school, principals have been told to call their parents rather than search them or demand they surrender it.

value.name: Don’t call police if students breach ban on knives at school, teachers told
value.description: Teachers have been told not to call police, search students or take ceremonial daggers off Sikh children under a new, temporary ban on any kind of knife - including religious ones - being brought ...
